# AAVE V3

![ERC20 screenshot](/img/templates/token_transfer.png)

A two pages template with `ContractRead`, `ContractWrite` and `ERC20TokenApproval`.

* [Example](https://fastdapp.xyz/app/aave)
* [Example on arbitrum](https://fastdapp.xyz/app/aave_arbitrum)
* [Landing page source](https://fastdapp.xyz/editor?template=aave)
* [Pool page](https://fastdapp.xyz/editor?template=aave_pool)
